title: GetAcceptedModes (Method)
text:
METHOD GetAcceptedModes : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Gets the Accepted_Modes of this BACnet object. The returned pointer is
allocated with the corresponding data, whereas the user has to use
FreeStackAllocatedMemory
,
to free the allocated memory after data usage.

rows.Name: uiListCount
rows.Comment: The length of the list in the following pointer

rows:
The returned Pointer gets filled with the data of the List AND (!) the data referenced within
that list (i.e. strings, etc.).
After usage, useFreeStackAllocatedMemory, to free the used memory.
